mil3.1.16:1.2: “bhante nagasena, ime dhamma nana santa ekam attham abhinipphadenti”ti?
mil3.1.16:1.3: “Ama, maharaja, ime dhamma nana santa ekam attham abhinipphadenti, kilese hananti”ti.
mil3.1.16:2.1: “Katham, bhante, ime dhamma nana santa ekam attham abhinipphadenti, kilese hananti?
mil3.1.16:2.3: “Yatha, maharaja, sena nana santa hatthi ca assa ca ratha ca patti ca ekam attham abhinipphadenti, sangame parasenam abhivijinanti;
mil3.1.16:2.4: evameva kho, maharaja, ime dhamma nana santa ekam attham abhinipphadenti, kilese hananti”ti.
